ComicInfo.Summary:
Uneasy lies the head that wears the crown...and that goes double for the cowl! Kick-Ass is now leading the reformed superhero team Justice Forever...just in time to face some terrifying new foes. But there's dissension in the JF ranks; will he be able to fend off a coup with Hit-Girl still in prison?
Meanwhile, a broken Red Mist gets some tough love from Mommie Dearest.
